companies.company_name: TIAA-CREF Social Choice LwCrbn Eq Instl

key_risks: Greenwashing concerns due to potential misalignment of investments with ESG goals
Performance volatility tied to market fluctuations
Reliance on inconsistent third-party ESG data
Regulatory risks from changes in ESG or carbon emissions regulations
controversies: Scrutiny over the authenticity of sustainability claims
Potential misalignment of holdings with stringent ESG criteria
environmental_issues: Reliance on ESG data providers with potential inconsistencies in carbon footprint metrics
social_issues: Commitment to ethical and social responsibility reflected in Above Average People rating
governance_issues: Dependence on non-standardized ESG data for investment decisions

sources.title: Nuveen Large Cap Responsible Eq R6 - Morningstar
sources.snippet: TIAA-CREF Social Choice Equity is a solid quasi-index fund in the sustainable investing space. It maintains Pillar ratings of Above Average for People and Average for Process.
sources.query_context: TIAA-CREF Social Choice LwCrbn Eq Instl TIAA-CREF Social Choice LwCrbn Eq Instl SEC investigations

sources.title: Nuveen Large Cap Responsible Equity Fund | Mutual Fund
sources.snippet: Effective 01 May 2024, the Fund's name changed from TIAA-CREF Social Choice Equity Fund to Nuveen Large Cap Responsible Equity Fund. Effective 06 May 2024, the Fund's Institutional, Advisor and Retail share classes were renamed, and an up-front sales charge was applied to certain purchases of Class A shares (formerly Retail Class shares).

sources.title: CREF Social Choice Account - TIAA
sources.snippet: The CREF Social Choice Account is a variable annuity* that offers you a one-stop responsible investment at one of the lowest costs in the industry. 1 *A variable annuity is an insurance contract and includes underlying investments whose value is tied to market performance.
